article: It had been a tiring day and I was looking forward to a quiet evening. My _ would not be back until late and I had _ to sit comfortably in a chair in the _ room and read a good book. I put the children to bed _ and prepared a cup of coffee for myself. Soon I was seated comfortably with my _ in front of me and the sandwich and the cup of coffee on a small table beside me. I was just beginning to _ the food when the telephone rang. I put down my book and hurried to _ it. By the time I got back to the living room, my coffee was _ . I ate the sandwich and begin _ cold coffee with the book _ open to the front page. _ there was a loud knock at the front _ . It surprised me so much that I spilled some coffee on my skirt. The man at the door was looking _ a certain address and _ me to give him some information. It _ me a long time to explain something to him. After that , I sat down again and _ to read a whole page without further interruption --- until the baby woke up. He started _ at the top of his voice, _ I run upstairs quickly. He was still awake at 11 o'clock when my husband came back. I really wanted to throw something _ him when he asked me if I had spent a _ evening.
